Package org.jetel.util.crypto

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EncryptAlgorithm
    Common interface for various encrypt/decrypt algorithm.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsymKeyManager
    Class for generating, storing and loading keys for asymmetric cryptography
    Base64
    Encodes and decodes to and from Base64 notation.
    Base64.InputStream
    A Base64.InputStream will read data from another java.io.InputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
    Base64.OutputStream
    A Base64.OutputStream will write data to another java.io.OutputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
    CombinedDecryptor
    Data encryption class decrypting data using symmetric key decrypted by an asymmetric key.
    CombinedEncryptor
    Data encryption class using symmetric cipher to crypt the data and asymmetric cipher to crypt symmetric key.
    Digest  
    EncryptDESWithMD5
    The password-based encryption algorithm as defined in: RSA Laboratories, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Encryption Standard," version 1.5
    Enigma
    Class for encrypting/decrypting strings (mostly passwords) stored by CloverETL
    SecureParametersUtils
    Utilities for manipulation with secure graph parameters.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Digest.DigestType
